transcript.text: Johnson Controls' policies can’t anticipate every situation. It’s important to seek guidance when you don’t know what's right under the circumstances.

contentBackground.img: Employee seeking guidance from Law team on the phone

panelText.text: Seek advice if you are unsure what you are allowed to offer and accept or have any questions in relation to gifts and entertainment.
If you witness or suspect any non-compliance with our policies, you have a duty to report it.

You can:
  • seek guidance from your Manager, Human Resources, and the Law or Compliance team
  • call or log the concern on the Johnson Controls Integrity Helpline
  • review the Third Party Travel, Gifts and Entertainment Policy and the Anti-Corruption Policy
